ej,harpb003,P,gormb901,Fighting (Threw helmet) ej,strih001,P,gormb901,Fighting $there was a history between Bryce Harper and Hunter Strickland from the 2014 post-season; Harper was hit by a 98-MPH fastball on the right hip; Harper pointed his bat at Strickland and yelled then charged the mound; he threw his helmet towards Strickland but it sailed wide; both players landed punches to the head; both benches cleared and a scrum ensued with players falling to the fround; three teammates took Strickland off the field and Harler was escorted off by Ryan Zimmerman; Strickland and Harper ejected by HP Umpire Brian Gorman
$originally scored as error, changed to single on 06-01-2017; his run is now earned
